all_text_timv: Larson, Ron, 1941- Elementary statistics : picturing the world / Ron Larson, Betsy Farber. 6th edition. Boston : Pearson, 2015. xix, 581 pages, 94 unnumbered pages : illustrations (some color) ; 29 cm + 1 DVD-ROM (4 3/4 in.) text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia computer c rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier computer disc cd rdacarrier Previous edition: 2012. Includes bibliographical references and index. Introduction to statistics -- Descriptive statistics -- Probability -- Discrete probability distributions -- Normal probability distributions -- Confidence intervals -- Hypothesis testing with one sample -- Hypothesis testing with two samples -- Correlation and regression -- Chi-square tests and the F-distribution -- Nonparametric tests (web only) -- Appendices. Alternative presentation of the standard normal distribution -- Tables --Normal probability plots. System requirements for accompanying DVD-ROM: Macintosh, Power PC or Intel 300 MHz processor; Mac 10.x; 800 x 600 resolution monitor; DVD drive. System requirements for accompanying DVD-ROM: Windows, Intel Pentium 700-MHz processor; Windows XP or Vista or Windows 7 or Windows 8; 800 x 600 resolution monitor; DVD drive. Purchased with funds from the  Paterno Libraries Endowment; 2017 Statistics. Statistics Textbooks. Farber, Elizabeth.
